text: 13:3 Godɨn Araziba 18:20Eghtɨ akam inigha izir gumazitam, Godɨn akamɨn mɨn ifavarir akabav kɨmtɨ, an amebam ko, afeziam uaning kamagh a mɨkɨm suam, ‘Nɨ uan akar ifavarimɨn gun mɨgei. Kar Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akam puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ aremegham.’ Gumazir kam akar ifavarir kam mɨkɨmtɨ, an amebam ko, an afeziam afuzimɨn a bɨraghtɨma, an aremegham.
